name: Skrt
description:
One button endless platforming!

Developed for the Weekly Game Jam week 165, theme: One Button Mash

Wanted to develop some interesting character movement that you can control with one button + first person mouse controls.

Instructions:

Mouse to look and to direct movement

Space for actions

Actions:

  • Press and release -> Jump
  • Press and release in air -> Double Jump
  • Press and hold -> Slide
  • Press and release on wall -> Wall Bounce
  • Press and hold on wall -> Wall Ride
Credits:

Developed by Maxwell Koo (mjkoo)

Textures from SuperGrid on Unreal Marketplace

Elements adapted from Matthew Palaje's Titanfall 2 tutorial

Post Process Fog adapted from Sam Jones' tutorial

Source Code Pro font from Google Fonts
